personal_info.name: Rahul Raj
personal_info.skills_summary: Dedicated Software Engineer with 4+ years experience in frontend & backend development, data engineering and cloud computing. Proficient in Angular, TypeScript, Python, C++.

responsibilities: Key member of MAP Team Squad A – mobile mapping device software.
Developed & maintained software using Angular, TypeScript, Python, C++, Electron.
Collaborated with UI/UX team to implement new features and fix issues.
Used Cypress (integration) & Angular (unit) testing for reliability.
Led lag‑evaluation initiatives; migrated systems to Ubuntu 22.04 & ROS topics.
Maintained device‑manager web portal built with React, TypeScript, Vite, Python.
Enhanced Navigator – data discovery tool; added micro‑service data view on Kubernetes.
Added Airflow DAG for daily data updates, improving accuracy.
Contributed to Careem Insights: database shortlisting, multi‑table joins; CI/CD via Jenkins & Kubernetes.
Implemented service monitoring metrics on Argus and improved open‑source Superset.
Developed & maintained Brandverse’s automated photography/video solution.
Built Chikoo e‑commerce platform features (WhatsApp ordering, voucher system).
Used React, TypeScript, Node, MongoDB, Kubernetes, Dgraph; deployed on Google Cloud Platform.
Led outsourced front‑end project for new service on Chikoo.
Deployed LimeSurvey with Docker for HR data collection.
Contributed to MegaACD Project – React, Node.js, TypeScript, PostgreSQL.
Assisted in Authentication Module using JWT.

education.institution: Ghulam Ishaq Khan Institute of Engineering Sciences and Technology
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
